trans-unit.source: Specifies the system parameter type.
The SystemParameter enumeration is primarily used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent%2A> method.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent%2A> retrieves whether a SystemParameter is supported on the current version of the operating system.
For more information about system-wide parameters, see "SystemParametersInfo" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com).
Identifies the caret width, in pixels, for edit controls.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.CaretWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to access this system-wide parameter.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETCARETWIDTH and SPI_SETCARETWIDTH.
To be added.
Identifies the drop shadow effect.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsDropShadowEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if this effect is enabled.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETDROPSHADOW and SPI_SETDROPSHADOW.
To be added.
Identifies the flat menu appearance feature.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsFlatMenuEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if this feature is enabled.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETFLATMENU and SPI_SETFLATMENU.
To be added.
Identifies the contrast value used in ClearType font smoothing.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FontSmoothingContrast%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to access this system-wide parameter.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETFONTSMOOTHINGCONTRAST and SPI_SETFONTSMOOTHINGCONTRAST.
To be added.
Identifies the type of font smoothing.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.FontSmoothingType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to access this system-wide parameter.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETFONTSMOOTHINGTYPE and SPI_SETFONTSMOOTHINGTYPE.
To be added.
Identifies the thickness of the left and right edges of the system focus rectangle.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.HorizontalFocusThickness%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to access this system-wide parameter.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameter is SM_CXFOCUSBORDER.
To be added.
Identifies the menu fade animation feature.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsMenuFadeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if this feature is enabled.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETMENUFADE and SPI_SETMENUFADE.
To be added.
Identifies the selection fade effect.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsSelectionFadeEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if this feature is enabled.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETSELECTIONFADE and SPI_SETSELECTIONFADE.
To be added.
Identifies the ToolTip animation feature.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.IsToolTipAnimationEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if this feature is enabled.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETTOOLTIPANIMATION and SPI_SETTOOLTIPANIMATION.
To be added.
Identifies the user interface (UI) effects feature.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.UIEffectsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine if this feature is enabled.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameters are SPI_GETUIEFFECTS and SPI_SETUIEFFECTS.
To be added.
Identifies the thickness of the top and bottom edges of the system focus rectangle.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalFocusThickness%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to access this system-wide parameter.
The corresponding Platform SDK system-wide parameter is SM_CYFOCUSBORDER.
To be added.
